creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: tall bottle with two small lug handles on each side; tall narrow cylindrical neck; mottled tan and brown, with mostly brown color on bottom and tan on upper half; ridged texture throughout; bottle is widest at about center; four vertical ridges that meet at corners of square shoulder
markings: maker\'s stamp on side near base: M
medium: Stoneware, yellow ash and matte brown glaze, with iron oxide spots
title: Vase
